summary: The eight-spoke Dharma wheel represents the Noble Eightfold Path, which shows the way to end suffering and be free from rebirth. This path has eight parts: right views, right plans, right words, right actions, right job, right effort, right focus, and right mindfulness. It starts with understanding our mind's flaws and ends with deep meditation. This path leads to nirvana, a peaceful state. The wheel's spokes symbolize these eight steps, guiding people towards Buddhist enlightenment.
title: Noble Eightfold Path
